api_list.name: Get Greet
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://greet-generator.p.rapidapi.com/greet/Amir/5"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "greet-generator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://greet-generator.p.rapidapi.com/greet/{name}/{cringelevel}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "greet-generator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
